mapper.sql: ITEM_FLOW, SCHEME_FLOW, SCHEME_NAME, ITEM_ID, ITEM_NAME, MAX_LIMIT, REMARK, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW, ITEM_PID
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from PDSCI.SRM_FUND_SCHEME_DETAIL
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into PDSCI.SRM_FUND_SCHEME_DETAIL (ITEM_FLOW, SCHEME_FLOW, SCHEME_NAME, ITEM_ID, ITEM_NAME, MAX_LIMIT, REMARK, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW, ITEM_PID) values (#{itemFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schemeFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{schemeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maxLimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update PDSCI.SRM_FUND_SCHEME_DETAIL

SCHEME_FLOW = #{record.schemeFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCHEME_NAME = #{record.schemeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEM_ID = #{record.itemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEM_NAME = #{record.itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

MODIFY_USER_FLOW = #{record.modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update PDSCI.SRM_FUND_SCHEME_DETAIL
SCHEME_FLOW = #{schemeFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCHEME_NAME = #{schemeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ITEM_NAME = #{itemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MAX_LIMIT = #{maxLimit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

RECORD_STATUS = #{recordStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_USER_FLOW = #{modifyUserFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ITEM_FLOW = #{itemFlow,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
